channel.title: Need Help Fast Plz

item.title: Need Help Fast Plz
item.dc:creator: @TaXaN TaXaN
item.description:
@TaXaN wrote:

iv just made my own custom spell using a tut from this forum, but the gfx i used (5 in total) all happen together and it is a bit funny lookin,

stillgfx(88, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(342, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(433, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(432, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(187, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
what do i put to make a 1 second break inbetween the gfx ? plz help . :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: May 22, 2007, 03:42:10 PM[/size][hr]plz can someone atleast tell me if its possible[br][size=1]Posted on: May 22, 2007, 03:51:33 PM[/size][hr]...[br][size=1]Posted on: May 22, 2007, 03:53:43 PM[/size][hr] come on please im desperate and obviousle new, is it even possible,?
